item.title: 4Q'17 Conference Call Highlights
item.description: Service Companies Halliburton Helmerich and Payne Upstream Companies Anadarko Cimarex Energy Chevron ConocoPhillips Diamondback Energy Encana Corporation ExxonMobil Laredo Petroleum Marathon Oil Murphy Oil Occidental Petroleum Pioneer Natural Resources Shell Service Companies Halliburton Total company revenue was $5.9 billion, representing a 9% increase from 3Qâ€™17. North American revenue was up ~7% sequentially. Improvement was driven by increased utilization and pricing throughout the United States.
